itunes:title: Embarrassing Tweets To Justin Bieber (Suzy Antonyan)
title: Embarrassing Tweets To Justin Bieber (Suzy Antonyan)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Our friend Suzy Antonyan comes by the studio to talk about her newly developed blueberry allergy, meeting Borat, her longer drive while working for Lyft, and she exposes her embarrassing tweets to her celebrity crush. Suzy is a ray of sunshine as she shares her secret to staying happy and always smiling. Please give it up for Suzy


Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod
